subject: Horse Racing
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The rush to improve safety since Eight Belles was euthanized at last year’s Kentucky Derby did little to curb the number of horses dying at American racetracks in 2008.
snippet: The rush to improve safety since Eight Belles was euthanized at last year’s Kentucky Derby did little to curb the number of horses dying at American racetracks in 2008.
